languages.text: Оказалось, Леди Кассия вовсе не госпожа в беде, а чудовище, что терроризирует Дом Орселлио уже многие годы. Она способна свести с ума или убить навигатора взглядом, и потому хранитель молит Вольного Торговца о последней услуге — подняться в покои, ослабить чудовище сияющим камнем-оберегом и привести вниз, на суд Фелеку.

traits.locale_text: Оказалось, Леди Кассия вовсе не госпожа в беде, а чудовище, что терроризирует Дом Орселлио уже многие годы. Она способна свести с ума или убить Навигатора взглядом, и потому хранитель молит Вольного Торговца о последней услуге — подняться в покои, надеть на нее сковывающий силы амулет и привести чудовище вниз, на суд Фелеку.

languages.text: It turns out that Lady Cassia is no damsel in distress but a vicious monster who has been terrorising House Orsellio for years. She is capable of driving a Navigator insane and killing them with a single glance. The Keeper has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glowing charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.
languages.original_text: Оказалось, Леди Кассия вовсе не госпожа в беде, а чудовище, что терроризирует Дом Орселлио уже многие годы. Она способна свести с ума или убить навигатора взглядом, и потому хранитель молит Вольного Торговца о последней услуге — подняться в покои, ослабить чудовище сияющим камнем-оберегом и привести вниз, на суд Фелеку.

traits.locale_text: It turns out that Lady Cassia isn't a mistress in distress but a vicious monster who's been terrorizing House Orsellio for years. She's capable of driving Navigator insane and murdering them with but a gaze. The Keeper asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glimmering charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.

It turns out that Lady Cassia is no damsel in distress but a vicious monster who has been terrorising House Orsellio for years. She is capable of driving a Navigator insane and killing them with a single glance. The Keeper has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glowing charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.

It turns out that Lady Cassia is no damsel in distress but a vicious monster who has been terrorising House Orsellio for years. She is capable of driving a Navigator insane and killing them with a single glance. The Keeper has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glowing charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.

languages.text: Es hat sich herausgestellt, dass Lady Cassia keine Dame in Not ist, sondern ein bösartiges Monster, das das Haus Orsellio seit Jahren terrorisiert. Sie kann mit einem einzigen Blick einen Navigator in den Wahnsinn treiben und töten. Der Hüter hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} um einen letzten Gefallen gebeten: in die oberen Kammern zu fahren, die Bestie mit einem Leuchtzauber zu schwächen und sie zur Verurteilung zu Felek zurückzubringen.
languages.original_text: It turns out that Lady Cassia is no damsel in distress but a vicious monster who has been terrorising House Orsellio for years. She is capable of driving a Navigator insane and killing them with a single glance. The Keeper has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glowing charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.

traits.locale_text: Es hat sich herausgestellt, dass Lady Cassia keine Dame in Not ist, sondern ein bösartiges Monster, das das Haus Orsellio seit Jahren terrorisiert. Sie kann mit einem einzigen Blick einen Navigator in den Wahnsinn treiben und töten. Der Hüter hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} um einen letzten Gefallen gebeten: in die oberen Kammern zu fahren, die Bestie mit einem Leuchtzauber zu schwächen und sie zur Verurteilung zu Felek zurückzubringen.

languages.text: Il s'avère que loin d'être une demoiselle en détresse, dame Cassia est en réalité un véritable monstre qui terrorise la maison Orsellio depuis des années. Elle est capable de rendre fou un navigateur puis de le tuer d'un simple regard. Le gardien a demandé une dernière chose {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} : il veut que {mf|ce dernier|cette dernière} monte jusqu'aux quartiers supérieurs, affaiblisse la créature à l'aide d'une amulette lumineuse, puis la ramène à Felek pour qu'elle soit jugée.
languages.original_text: It turns out that Lady Cassia is no damsel in distress but a vicious monster who has been terrorising House Orsellio for years. She is capable of driving a Navigator insane and killing them with a single glance. The Keeper has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glowing charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.

traits.locale_text: Il s'avère que loin d'être une demoiselle en détresse, dame Cassia est en réalité un véritable monstre qui terrorise la maison Orsellio depuis des années. Elle est capable de rendre fou un navigateur puis de le tuer d'un simple regard. Le gardien a demandé une dernière chose {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} : il veut que {mf|ce dernier|cette dernière} monte jusqu'aux quartiers supérieurs, affaiblisse la créature à l'aide d'une amulette lumineuse, puis la ramène à Felek pour qu'elle soit jugée.

languages.text: 事实证明，卡西娅女士并非陷入困境的无辜少女，而是多年来一直恐吓、威胁奥赛罗家族的恶毒怪物。她的能力可以让家族的导航者发疯，只要一个眼神就能夺走他们的生命。费雷克恳求行商浪人答应他最后一个请求：前往上层大厅，用发光的护身符削弱那个怪物的力量，把她带回到费雷克身边，让她接受审判。
languages.original_text: It turns out that Lady Cassia is no damsel in distress but a vicious monster who has been terrorising House Orsellio for years. She is capable of driving a Navigator insane and killing them with a single glance. The Keeper has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glowing charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.

traits.locale_text: 事实证明，卡西娅女士并非陷入困境的无辜少女，而是多年来一直恐吓、威胁奥塞罗家族的恶毒怪物。她的能力可以让家族的导航者发疯，只要一个眼神就能夺走他们的生命。费雷克恳求行商浪人答应他最后一个请求：前往上层大厅，用发光的护身符削弱那个怪物的力量，把她带回到费雷克身边，让她接受审判。

languages.text: レディ・カシアは助けを待つか弱き女性ではなく、オーセリオ家を長年にわたって恐怖に陥れてきた凶悪な怪物であることが判明した。彼女は航宙士を狂わせ、視線だけで殺すことができる。管理者は自由開拓者に最後の依頼をした。それは上階へと上がり、チャームの光で魔物を弱らせ、審判のためにフェレックのところへ連れてくるというものだった。
languages.original_text: It turns out that Lady Cassia is no damsel in distress but a vicious monster who has been terrorising House Orsellio for years. She is capable of driving a Navigator insane and killing them with a single glance. The Keeper has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glowing charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.

traits.locale_text: レディ・カシアは助けを待つか弱き女性ではなく、オーセリオ家を長年にわたって恐怖に陥れてきた凶悪な怪物であることが判明した。彼女は航宙士を狂わせ、視線だけで殺すことができる。管理者は自由開拓者に最後の依頼をした。それは上階へと上がり、チャームの光で魔物を弱らせ、審判のためにフェレックのところへ連れてくるというものだった。

languages.text: Resulta que lady Cassia no es ninguna damisela en apuros, sino un monstruo espantoso que aterra a la casa Orsellio desde hace años. Es capaz de volver loco y matar a un navegante con una sola mirada. El guardián ha hecho una última petición a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente: que suba a las cámaras superiores, debilite al monstruo con un amuleto brillante y lo traiga ante Felek para su juicio.
languages.original_text: It turns out that Lady Cassia is no damsel in distress but a vicious monster who has been terrorising House Orsellio for years. She is capable of driving a Navigator insane and killing them with a single glance. The Keeper has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glowing charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.

traits.locale_text: Resulta que lady Cassia no es ninguna damisela en apuros, sino un monstruo espantoso que aterra a la casa Orsellio desde hace años. Es capaz de volver loco y matar a un navegante con una sola mirada. El guardián ha hecho una última petición a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente: que suba a las cámaras superiores, debilite al monstruo con un amuleto brillante y lo traiga ante Felek para su juicio.

languages.text: Leydi Cassia'nın hiç de yardıma muhtaç savunmasız bir kız olmadığı, aksine Orsellio Hanesi'ne yıllardır kök söktüren habis bir canavar olduğu ortaya çıktı. Üstelik bu canavar, Rotacıları deliye döndürebilecek ve tek bakışıyla canlarından edecek güce sahip. İstasyon Sorumlusu, Hür Tacir'den son bir ricada bulundu. Üst kata çıkmanı, parıldayan bir tılsımla yaratığı zayıf düşürmeni ve adaletin sağlanması için Felek'in karşısına getirmeni istiyor.
languages.original_text: It turns out that Lady Cassia is no damsel in distress but a vicious monster who has been terrorising House Orsellio for years. She is capable of driving a Navigator insane and killing them with a single glance. The Keeper has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the upper chambers, weaken the beast with a glowing charm, and bring her back to Felek for judgement.

traits.locale_text: Leydi Cassia'nın hiç de yardıma muhtaç savunmasız bir kız olmadığı, aksine Orsellio Hanesi'ne yıllardır kök söktüren habis bir canavar olduğu ortaya çıktı. Üstelik bu canavar, Rotacıları deliye döndürebilecek ve tek bakışıyla canlarından edecek güce sahip. İstasyon Sorumlusu, Hür Tacir'den son bir ricada bulundu. Üst kata çıkmanı, parıldayan bir tılsımla yaratığı zayıf düşürmeni ve adaletin sağlanması için Felek'in karşısına getirmeni istiyor.
